readable.title: 241346352_c5a0ea43c6
readable.content: A football player is kicking the ball while the opposing fans watch . A football player kicks the ball during a game with a red shirted crowd looking on . A male wearing a football uniform kicking a football during a football game . A man punting a football as fans from the opposing team watch in the background The Sooners play another football team , number 17 goes after the ball .
